title: Stream: Nightlives – A Wink In The Face Of Death
body:
One of the best album titles of the year comes from Toronto duo **Nightlives**, in the form of their debut LP _**A Wink In The Face Of Death**_.

Released earlier this week, it’s a record characterised by it’s menacing, sultry atmosphere yet intertwined with a stark refusal to abandon any of it’s pop influences. Where **The Neighbourhood** drew the line between **Foster The People** and **Lana Del Rey**, **Nightlives** pick up a similar baton however mixing in a healthy dose of shoegaze. Check out their debut LP below, including the previous heard [Give Nothing](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17981-new-nightlives-give-nothing/) and [Underneath](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17896-introducing-nightlives/).
